p: The incorporation of Moringa oleifera seed meal in biscuits is reported to improve protein intake, increasing it by 45% to 90% if the addition of Moringa oleifera is 10% or 20% respectively. In the case of rice cakes, the addition of Moringa oleifera at 5% (freshly harvested) to 14% (dried) increases protein by approximately 26% [ 15].
